slides.title: Child Routes
Lazy Loading
slides.content:
# Lazy Loading üí§

Load a module/component only when the user visits the route. Crucial for performance.

```typescript
{
  path: 'admin',
  loadChildren: () => import('./admin/admin.module').then(m => m.AdminModule)
}
```

slides.title: Route Guards
slides.content:
# Security üõ°Ô∏è

Protect routes using Guards (CanActivate).

```typescript
{
  path: 'admin',
  component: AdminComponent,
  canActivate: [AuthGuard]
}
```
The `AuthGuard` service implements `CanActivate` and returns `true` or `false` (or a UrlTree to redirect).

slides.title: Resolvers
slides.content:
# Resolvers ü§ù

Pre-fetch data BEFORE the route is activated.

This ensures the component has data ready when it loads, preventing "pop-in" or empty states.

```typescript
resolve: {
  hero: HeroResolver
}
```

slides.title: Wildcard Route
slides.content:
# 404 Page ‚ùì

Handle unknown URLs.

Must be the **last** route in the configuration array.

```typescript
{ path: '**', component: PageNotFoundComponent }
```
